turkish_example_sentence: Ben yeni spor ayakkabı istediğimde, annem bana para vermiş.
english_example_sentence: When I wanted new sports shoes, my mother gave me money.
russian_example_sentence: Когда я хотел новые спортивные кроссовки, моя мама дала мне деньги.
